item.title: All is Mental: The Hermetic Principle of Consciousness
item.description: Exploring the Hermetic Principle that the universe is mental, shaping reality through consciousness.

item.title: Forms of Revelation: Navigating Divine Communication
item.description: Understanding the varied forms of divine revelation and how to discern their truth through heightened consciousness.
